value:
Allegiance Battles:
A battle where foes continuously
appear and Legendary Heroes
with Pair Up can be used. Your
friends' proxies can also Pair Up
with the unit in your fourth team
slot. (The proxy replaces any Hero
already paired with your unit.)

Difficulty:
The difficulty sets the max damage
you can deal and the rate at which
Boost increases damage output.
Attack Røkkr: +0.1×Boost, always
KO Beginner foe: +0.1×Boost
KO Intermediate foe: +0.2×Boost
KO Advanced foe: +0.4×Boost

Defeat:
If you are defeated, damage dealt
up to that point will be recorded.

Surrender:
If you surrender, all damage dealt
up to that point will be lost.

Defense Rewards:
・ Rewards are granted based on
the total Lift lost across the three
failed defenses with the highest
Lift lost during the season.
・ More rewards are available in
Tier 20 and above.
